SeleccionEntidad.ConsultaEdicion: select distinct ?s ?p ?name from <http://lariojaturismo.gnoss.com/destination.owl> WHERE { ?s ?p ?name. FILTER (?p=<http://protege.stanford.edu/rdf/HTOv4002#name>) } order by ?name
